notes: Muffin source was from a picture of a cookbook, but I'm not sure which it came from. The title was: Mrs. Pulsford's Blueberry Muffins
recipe: In a medium bowl, combine the brown sugar, flour, butter, and cinnamon. Rub with your fingers to form coarse crumbs then refrigerate until ready to use
Cream butter and sugar until fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time and beat well. Sift dry ingredients together and add alternately with milk. Stir in blueberries.
Pour into greased muffin cups and sprinkle with the streusel topping
